forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers during the morning giving way to periods of light rain this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Isolated thunderstorms this morning, then mainly cloudy this afternoon with light rain possible. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 51F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 18C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 64F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 51F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
